title: Pimm's melon cup
ingredients: ['1 small Ogen melon', '1 small cantaloupe melon', '200 g (7 oz) strawberries, sliced', '1 pear, cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) chunks', '¼ cucumber, cut into 1 cm (½ in) dice', '1 carambola (star fruit), cut into 5 mm (¼ in) slices', "6 tbsp Pimm's", '2 tbsp shredded fresh mint or lemon balm leaves', 'borage flowers to decorate (optional)']
